snippet: By the end of the week, Andy Murray could become the top-ranked player in the world for the first time in his career....
lead_paragraph: By the end of the week, Andy Murray could become the top-ranked player in the world for the first time in his career.

headline.print_headline: Andy Murray Finally Has a Chance to Become No. 1
